ability.name: Throwaway Joke
ability.description: * Place any card on Throwaway Joke. * Draw and discard the top card of your deck. * If it was The Tower, trigger Catastrophe. * If it was a Major Arcana, nothing happens. * If it was a Sword, deal 3 Damage. * If it was a Cup, gain 3 Shield. * If it was a Wand, deal 1 Ranged Damage. * If it was a Pentacle, you and each of your allies gain 1 Shield. * At the end of the turn, discard any card on Throwaway Joke.
ability.flavor: Reaching into your side pockets, you retrieve a random object that will either help or hurt: a rock, some gum, an old ticket...
